## DialogPopupContentComponent interface

Component that is rendered within dialog and represents popup

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DialogPopupContentComponent<TOptions = any, TValue = any, TCssClasses = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./grid-material.dialogpopupcontentcomponent.data.md) | <code>DialogPopupComponentData&lt;TOptions, TValue, TCssClasses&gt;</code> | Data that are used for communication with Popup |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./grid-material.dialogpopupcontentcomponent.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
